Comcast is reporting that aerial fiber-optic cables have been cleanly cut along El Dorado Street in Stockton, indicating possible vandalism. We are working with Comcast for an estimated repair time. Based on past experience, this could be an all-day outage event. Our deepest apologies go out to all of the students and teachers impacted by this outage.

This year, LUSD expanded PLTW instruction by integrating PLTW coursework within the NGSS science units for all K-5 students.
